verses.name: Psalms 34:7
verses.text: The angel of the Lord encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.

verses.name: Psalms 34:8
verses.text: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.

verses.name: Psalms 34:9
verses.text: O fear the Lord, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.

verses.name: Psalms 34:10
verses.text: The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the Lord shall not want any good thing.

verses.name: Psalms 34:11
verses.text: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 34:12
verses.text: What man is he that desireth life, and loveth many days, that he may see good?
